Context: George Brown College is transitioning from Blackboard to Brightspace on August 31, 2023. Brightspace is a learning platform that offers a more engaging and interactive learning experience with new and familiar tools and resources. Students can contact Brightspace 24/7Student Help through the Help Desk Live Chat or call 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559) or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's social media hub can also be visited for additional information. The information on the website is subject to change without notice and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
